page.title: 14BUSINESSES IN EPPERSTONE
page.content: A wide range of commercial activity is found,though employment of local people is limited.Most industries relate to the agricultural basis of the community.They include a Land Rover Specialists which employs 9 mechanics to service up to 150 vehicles per month, a Tractor Services employing 4 people,a fitter,a blacksmith,a fruit and vegetable farm shop dealing largely in bulk sales and an abbatoir.This employs 8 people to process 250 beasts(mainly pigs)in a 6-day week. In addition a highly specialised model-making business in the Lichfield Library employs 3 people to produce train and aircraft kits for an international market.Several self employed residents work from home. There are 2 self-catering flats & some B&B is provided on one outlying farm.
